chapter.title: Vouchering Sheets
chapter.para: Now that you've installed and set up CORE Time & Expense, you are ready to begin processing Time and Expense Sheets. In this chapter we will review how to process Open Time and Expense Sheets. The following topics will be covered:

section.title: Approving Sheets
section.para: Approving Sheets is performed in the Open Sheets screen. For this scenario, we'll need to select a single sheet to begin. To select a Sheet, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Follow this path: Sales > Time and Expense > Open Sheets...

note.para: The buttons that are disabled are controlled by privileges. Privileges are discussed in Chapter 1 - System Administration.

section.para: Let's approve the Sheet, 1012. To get started, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Select the Approve button. The Sheet is now Approved and ready for Invoicing and Vouchering.

section.title: Vouchering Sheets
section.para: The invoicing of specific Sheets is performed in the Open Sheets screen. For this scenario, we'll need to select a single sheet to begin. To select a Sheet, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Follow this path: Sales > Time and Expense > Open Sheets...

note.para: The buttons that are disabled are controlled by privileges. Privileges are discussed in Chapter 1 - System Administration.
In order to generate a Voucher for an Employee, the Employee must also be a Vendor.

listitem.para: Select a Sheet that has been Approved
Click the Invoice button to generate a Voucher.

note.para: The Voucher Status changes to 'C' for Completed.

listitem.para: Follow this path: Accounting > Accounts Payable > Voucher > List Unposted...
The Expense Item setup drives the automated distribution in the Voucher.
The Notes from the Expense entry are passed through to the Voucher Item.
